Class: LegacyTextItem

LegacyTextItem

new LegacyTextItem()

A text object created in Illustrator CS (version 10) or earlier, which is uneditable until converted. To convert legacy text, see convertToNative. You can view, move, and print legacy text, but you cant edit it. Legacy text has an “x” through its bounding box when selected.
Source:
  • LegacyTextItem.js, line 6
